Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeRoom, ExecutiveRoom, StandardRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object
The abstract Room class represents the base for the hotel rooms in the hotel reservation system. It has a name, which is unique to the hotel, a base price, which is the base cost per night, a list of availability, which represents its availability across the entire month, and a list of price rates, which represents its price rates across the entire month, with respect to the minimum and maximum date reservation value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String name, double basePrice, ArrayList<Double> priceRate)
      Initializes a new room object with the given name, base price, and price rates, and sets its availability to true across the entire month. Pre-condition: name is unique from the other rooms in the system, and base price and price rates are within the valid values.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the room.
      basePrice - the base price of the room.
      priceRate - the list of room price rates across the entire month.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the room object.
      Returns:
      the name of the room.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice(int date)
      Returns the price of the room object given the considered date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered.
      Returns:
      the price of the room.

    • getAvailability

      public ArrayList<Boolean> getAvailability()
      Returns the list of availability of the room object across the entire month.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of availability of the room.

    • setName

      public void setName(char letter)
      Replaces and sets the first character of the name of the room object with given letter.
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter to use to replace the first character of the name of the room.

    • setBasePrice

      public void setBasePrice(double basePrice)
      Sets the base price of the room object to the given base price value. Pre-condition: base price is greater than or equal to 100.0.
      Parameters:
      basePrice - the base price to use to set the base price of the room.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(int startDate, int endDate, boolean available)
      Sets the availability status of the room object for a range of dates in a list based on the provided start and end dates. Pre-condition: startDate is before endDate, and startDate and endDate is within the range of the minimum and maximum date reservation values.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the starting date for which availability of the room object needs to be set.
      endDate - the ending date for which availability of the room object needs to be considered.
      available - the availability status to set the availability of the room object.

    • setPriceRate

      public void setPriceRate(ArrayList<Double> priceRate)
      Sets the price rates of the room with the given list of price rates. Pre-condition: price rate values are within the range of 0.50 to 1.50.
      Parameters:
      priceRate - the new list of price rates for the room.
